soul_glow.name: Soul Vision
soul_glow.description: You can see the souls of undead creatures glowing yellow through walls.

attack_modifier.name: Righteous Judgment
attack_modifier.description: Your attacks set undead creatures on fire, weaken them, and release bursts of golden energy particles.

justice_aura.name: Justice Aura
justice_aura.description: Your body emits golden particles, representing the power of your justice soul.

name: Justice Soul
description: Your soul resonates with the golden light of justice. You can see undead through walls, your attacks bring righteous judgment upon them, and you float gently when falling. Your body emits a soft golden glow.
